com.here.mobility.sdk.map.geocoding

Class GeocodingRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.map.geocoding.GeocodingRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public abstract class GeocodingRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    The request to the geocoding service. This actually bundles three separate services:
    1. Forward geocoding: given a textual query, find a list of places and/or addresses around a given location that match that query.
    2. Reverse geocoding: given a location, find the address at that location.
    3. Places around: given a location, find places of interest near that location.

        public static GeocodingRequest newForwardRequest(@NonNull
                                                 java.lang.String query,
                                                 @NonNull
                                                 LatLng location,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 java.lang.String countryCode,
                                                 @NonNull
                                                 java.util.Collection<GeocodingResult.Type> resultTypes)
        Creates a new forward geocoding request with the given query, around the given location, in the given country, requesting results of the given types.
        Parameters:
        query - The search query itself; may not be null or empty.
        location - The location around which to search for results
        countryCode - ISO 3166 alpha 3 country to code used filter results
        resultTypes - The result types to obtain
